name: Zombie Sniper Shooting for Kids - Kill all the zombies to survive!
name_original: Zombie Sniper Shooting for Kids - Kill all the zombies to survive!
description:
Zombie Sniper Shooting for Kid - Play the latest sniper game!

Take your best shot at zombies and defend the village against dead zombies! As you progress through the 10 levels, you will need to kill more zombies!

Zombie Sniper Shooting for Kid is a fun zombie shooting game for kids. The game take place in an abandoned village where zombies have take control of the town. Your job is to kill every zombie in each level. Defend yourself and take your best shot!
Not sure of your target? Press the "Sniper Mode" button to zoom on your target, aim and shoot!!
It’s easy to learn but hard to master!

Zombie Sniper Shooting for Kid - A fun game for kids, boys and girls. Prepare yourself for a whole lot of fun by killing all the zombie with your precision rifle...

Features:

- Lots and lots of zombie
- Sniper Mode
- Colorful gameplay
- Great soundtrack
- Cool Headshots
- Many dead hungry zombies

Zombie Sniper Shooting for Kid - A fun game for kids. Download now and play!
